Regulation Name(s): CFTR (cystic fibrosis transmembrane conductance regulator) gene mutation detection system
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Tag-It™ Cystic Fibrosis Kit for qualitative genotyping of CFTR gene mutations and variants in human blood using multiplex PCR and bead-based detection
Indications for Use Summary: Used to detect and identify a panel of CFTR gene mutations and variants in human blood for carrier testing in adults of reproductive age, newborn screening, and confirmatory diagnostic testing in newborns and children; not indicated for fetal or pre-implantation testing or stand-alone diagnostics
